name: Querent
description:
A prologue to Querent, a near-future speculative noir adventure.  The world is very much not what it seems.

Includes craps tables, tarot cards, and forcible tattooing. Updated Nov 16 with new paths for interacting with two NPCs!

Read more:

http://amateurbombmuseum.tumblr.com/post/102510921856/querent
